description: These emojis were just too big to fit in the three column tables. Their excitement is so huge that their bodies need to take up a whole lot of space. These text faces need a lot of space in order to show up properly, such as in an e-mail or on a website. They do not always work for text messaging for instant messenger apps.  ☆*･゜ﾟ･*(^O^)/*･゜ﾟ･*☆ ☆*:.｡. o(≧▽≦)o .｡.:*☆ *✲ﾟ*｡✧٩(･ิᴗ･ิ๑)۶*✲ﾟ*｡✧ ｡.ﾟ+:((ヾ(｡･ω･)ｼ)).:ﾟ+｡ ＼（　●　⌒　∇　⌒　●　）／ ☆ミヾ(∇≦((ヾ(≧∇≦)〃))≧∇)ノ彡☆ ﾟ･✿ヾ╲(｡◕‿◕｡)╱✿･ﾟ ＼＼(゜ロ＼＼)Ξ(／／ロ゜)／／ o͡͡͡͡͡͡͡͡͡͡͡͡͡͡╮(^ ਊ ^)╭o͡͡͡͡͡͡͡͡͡͡͡͡͡͡
title: Giant Emoticons
